sentence.Network_en: The responsibilities of a teacher lie not only in the inculcation of knowledge, but also in the setting of good examples and cultivating of virtues.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师的责任不单是传授知识, 更要树立良好榜样,培养学生的品德.

sentence.Network_en: Inculcation is the basic way of Marxist theory education.
sentence.Network_cn: 灌输是马克思主义政治教育的基本原则.

sentence.Network_en: Inculcation is the basic principle of ideaology and politics education.
sentence.Network_cn: 灌输是思想政治教育的基本原理.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Inculcation theory is the fundamental principle and method for ideological education.灌输论是思想政治教育的基本原则和基本方法。

list.abs: why non - inculcation moral education is possible ., 没有灌输的道德教育何以可能.
inculcating Theory of Marxism is the basic theory of ideological and political education .马克思主义灌输理论是思想政治教教育的基础理论。
inculcate students with love of knowledge ., 谆谆教诲学生热爱知识.
Above all , however , Puritans sought to inculcate godly and loving character traits in their children ., 然而 , 父母最重要的是寻求把爱神和爱人的品行放在孩子的心中.

means.word_mean: 1. teaching or impressing upon the mind by frequent instruction or repetition
